ca.sharcnet.nerve.docnav.dom

Class CommentNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.sharcnet.nerve.docnav.dom.Node
      • ca.sharcnet.nerve.docnav.dom.CommentNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Node>

    public class CommentNode
extends Node
    The inner text of a comment node does not contain the braces.

      CommentNode(java.lang.String sourceText)
      By-value constructor, if 'sourceText' starts with '>!--' and ends with '--<', 'innertext' will have the enclosing comment markup truncated.
